Headline: #3 King Drive, #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Monroe
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive, 4 Cottage Grove  buses temp. rerouted NB Michigan, State, Monroe and Michigan SB Michigan, State, Roosevelt and Michigan: near Michigan/Monroe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive, #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan/Monroe, due to street blockage near Michigan/Monroe.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Roosevelt, State, Monroe and Michigan including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Madison, State, Roosevelt and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.
